title: Cleansed a Fizz ultimate with Quicksilver Sash in top lane as Riven:
body:
And it didn't drop the Shark. I checked the replay and it just bugged and didn't work properly.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Had it happen as ADC before too.

Timing was impeccable, so it just seems to have coding issues.

replies.body:
Quicksilver Sash removed the fish from you, it still placed the fish on the ground so anyone can still walk over it before it activate
I assume you step on the fish again after QSSing but didnt realise

> [{quoted}](name=Corsage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2uMerlvK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-13T08:17:02.045+0000)
>
> Quicksilver Sash removed the fish from you, it still placed the fish on the ground so anyone can still walk over it before it activate
> I assume you step on the fish again after QSSing but didnt realise

No it just didn't drop it; however, I did flash and then hit QSS and it stayed attached so maybe that's why it bugged out.
